title: Avrohom Avinu's Real Estate Deal
body: Israel's Ministry of Housing uses Avrohom Avinu's purchase of the Me'aras Hamachpeilah to illustrate real estate market lessons, touching on property registration and market dangers.

title: Chareidi Food Insecurity Soars
body: Israel's National Insurance Institute reports 2.78 million Israelis, including 1 million children, lived with food insecurity last year, with the chareidi community hit hardest.

title: Har Nof Massacre Anniversary
body: Today marks 11 years since 2 terrorists attacked Kehillas Bnei Torah in Har Nof, killing 5 residents during Shacharis morning prayers.

title: Rabbi Boruch Sholom Kahan
body: Rabbi Boruch Sholom Kahan z”l, a devoted Chabad chossid, passed away at 91. Born in Kharkov in 5694, he grew up in a family of unwavering faith under Soviet oppression.
